text: __NOTOC__ Year 188 (CLXXXVIII) was a leap year starting on Monday of the Julian calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Empire ==== * Publius Helvius Pertinax becomes proconsul of Africa. ==== Asia ==== * Queen Himiko (aka, Pimiko) starts to rule in Japan. * Zhang Ju and Zhang Chun are defeated by Han forces under Liu Yu. == Births == * April 4 - Lucius Septimius Bassianus (Caracalla), Roman Emperor (d. 217) * Sun Shao, general of Wu (d. 241) == Deaths == *
